title: Poor credit ok! Big 2BR/conv 3 close to R 46th St
posting_body: ['BAD CREDIT OK!', 'If you\'re the type that says "I have money, my credit is just bad and getting rejected by everywhere!"', 'This is for you.', 'https://youtu.be/rwD2G31TAyIk', 'This is the video tour of the apartment.', 'Please note, the apartments tend to look smaller on videos than they actually are.', 'Less than 5 min from R 46th Street station.', "Because it's railroad, it might be more suitable to be used as 2BR (separate entrances) Please view the video tour first to make sure that this is the layout that suits your needs.", "Otherwise, it's a great deal.", 'Bad credit ok!', 'Pets ok.', 'Available now.', ' Email us with your name, phone number and tell us something about yourself and whoever you will be living with.', 'Broker fee applies.', " Especially if you don't have good credit, this is not negotiable"]
